hero.name: Nabaoui Aymen
hero.description: I am a full stack web developer, capable of creating robust, scalable, and high-performance web applications. I have gained skills in front-end technologies such as React, Angular, and Redux, as well as back-end technologies like Node.js, Laravel, and PHP, and in managing SQL and NoSQL databases. My goal is to leverage my expertise to deliver innovative solutions that drive business growth and provide high-quality user experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a recent graduate in digital development, specializing in full stack web development at the beginning of my career, focused on designing and building modern web applications. My journey in web development began with a strong curiosity about how things work and has evolved into a career where I strive to constantly learn and adapt to new challenges. Through my education and practical projects, I have gained solid skills in technologies such as React, Node.js, Angular, Laravel, MySQL, and MongoDB, while using collaborative tools like GitHub, GitLab, Jira, and Docker. What motivates me most is the ability to transform an idea into a concrete, intuitive, and high-quality solution for users. I place great importance on organization, code clarity, and the continuous improvement of my skills.

items.role: Intern as a Full Stack Web Developer
items.description: Internship carried out as part of my training, with the main objective of designing and developing a complete web application dedicated to the geolocation and document management of the company M-AUTOMOTIVâ€™s sites across Morocco.

items.title: Web Application for Site Geolocation and Document Management
items.description: M-LOCATION is a complete web application for site geolocation and document management for the company M-AUTOMOTIV. It allows users to visualize sites on an interactive map, manage associated documents, and control access according to user roles.

items.title: HR Management Application
items.description: HR-Connect is a web application to manage human resources for a company, such as employees, departments, contracts, salaries, and leave, with a dashboard for overall tracking and activity logs.

items.title: Trainee Registration Platform
items.description: This web application allows the registration of trainees, validation or rejection of their applications based on personal information and predefined criteria. It facilitates registration management.

items.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
items.description: This Tic Tac Toe game is a mini-project allowing two players to compete, automatically detects the winner or a draw, and offers the possibility to restart a game.
